title: Manohari Kanti Haaram: Exquisite Diamond & Gemstone Necklace
materials: Natural Emeralds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This delicate Kanti Haaram showcases a floral-inspired design, adorned with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. A central teardrop pendant features a vibrant emerald center, surrounded by a ring of meticulously set rubies. The pendant is finished with dainty gold ghungroo-style drops for a touch of traditional flair. The necklace chain consists of interconnected flower-shaped gold elements, each studded with diamonds. The intricate setting highlights the gemstones, creating a captivating play of light.
colors: White (Diamonds). A classic South Indian color palette known for its auspiciousness.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or a half-saree function. Its delicate design also makes it suitable for elegant evening wear.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and modern elegance. This Haaram represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and natural gemstones ensures enduring beauty and value. Its intricate design and vibrant color combination make it a true statement piece, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South India.
